title: Can a husband prevent his wife from giving her own money to her family? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: the fourth question her a husband forbids his wife to send her money that she works and earns to her family does he have the right no he has no right in that his right is to order her to sit home because if he allows her to work this is something from his with his permission but he has no right to control her financial expenditure she works she earns she is free to send all of her money to her family and you have no control over that
